== Ubuntu Desktop with nVIDIA Drivers Testing ==

=== Testing Instructions ===

Downloading images

For Ubuntu 18.10: Daily ISO images are found at <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/daily-live/current/|Ubuntu Cosmic 18.10]]</nowiki>.

For Ubuntu 18.04: <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/bionic/daily-live/current/ |Ubuntu Bionic 18.04]]</nowiki>.

The tests will appear in the tracker and everybody is free to submit their results any time during the period of testing.

You will see the tracker (<nowiki>[[http://xorg.qa.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>). Select the Ubuntu version you wish to install/run the tests on:

<nowiki>[[File:tracker_new.png]]</nowiki>

Then you need to click on the product "Ubuntu Desktop" as follows:

<nowiki>[[File:product.png]]</nowiki>

The list of testcases appear, with a summary on how many results have been reported:

<nowiki>[[File:testlist.png]]</nowiki>

To read the instructions on how to perform the testing, and report your result, click on any of them. The testcase view will show a form to report your result and a link to the testcase wiki, to guide you through the process:

<nowiki>[[File:teststeps.png]]</nowiki>

Filling information about your hardware/driver:
## In the comments section of the test results: 
### Paste the output of the command: 'lspci -v -s 01:00'.
### Paste the output of the command: 'ubuntu-report show'
### Specify the proprietary Nvidia driver version that you are using.

<nowiki>[[File:submit_result.png]]</nowiki>

To report bugs, follow the instructions at <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ReportingBugs]]</nowiki>.
